description: Selects all elements that are descendants of a specific ancestor.
selects: All <p> elements that are descendants of <div> elements

description: Selects all child elements specified by "child" of elements specified by "parent".
selects: All <p> elements that are children of <div> elements

description: Selects all first "next" elements that follow right after the "prev" element.
selects: All <h2> elements that are right after each <p> element

description: Selects all "siblings" elements that follow after the "prev" element.
selects: All <h3> elements that are the following siblings of <p> elements
